Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier interlocking problems at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier interlocking problems at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
